survey.title: SUPPORT THE LAW--POLICE SURVEY
survey.introduction: Dear Sir or Madam: program from R.J. Reynolds Tobacco. This program is aimed at helping retailers keep cigarettes out of the hands of kids. Your thoughts and Would you please take a moment and complete this questionnaire about the materials you received. Your assistance is greatly appreciated.

questions.question: Did you receive the 'Support The Law' information kit and material samples which you requested?
Once you received the kit and materials, did you review them in detail?

According to our records, you did not request any additional information. If you did, please let us know and we'll follow-up with your order. Otherwise, would you mind telling us why you didn't feel the need to order additional information?
Did you share the program with anyone else in: Your department?
Did you share the program with anyone else in: The community?

survey.closing: Thank you very much for your time.
